alert.note: Alert for Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CLAY AND SOUTHWESTERN DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 914 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cecil Field, or 12 miles north of Middleburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Cecil Field, Maxville, Oakleaf Plantation, Lakeside, and Jacksonville Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
